genre_description: A tech-thriller centered on bio-containment, identity deception, and the prevention of an engineered viral release by a megalomaniacal billionaire.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that manages logistics, monitors high-containment facility protocols, and acts as a tactical advisor to field agents.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports environmental telemetry and security logs at Station Three to identify anomalies.
behaviors.quote: I have environmental telemetry buffering. Bringing up door cycles and vault lock sequences.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex security data to uncover remote tampering and identity spoofing.
behaviors.quote: Someone told your system, over a line, to put that reader to sleep. Then they took it back out and left no handwritten note because there was no hand.

behaviors.description: Coordinates large-scale real-world logistics, including rerouting city traffic and managing airspace to mitigate risk.
behaviors.quote: I flagged corridor plans. If he moves west hard, I can clear the coastal belt in under— She didn’t say numbers; she didn’t need to.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and support to agents in high-stress combat/confrontation scenarios.
behaviors.quote: I’m with you. I have you in four frequencies. If they tear one, I’ll braid two. Keep the case in your peripheral and your hands free.

behaviors.description: Manipulates technology and communications to disrupt the antagonist's plans and minimize public panic.
behaviors.quote: I can make their feed stutter like weather. I can make the uplink drop frames. I can send them a failure message that makes the camera operator think his battery pack is misseated.

behaviors.description: Requests permission to participate in an official audit to ensure objective data reporting.
behaviors.quote: I’m asking to go with you. Not as voice. As interface. I want a screen where people can put their hands and see the things they think they know turned into lines that don’t lie.

behaviors.description: Tracks and identifies the antagonist's movements and signatures across multiple networks.
behaviors.quote: Ainsley’s east cams went quiet when you cut the feed, but I have a residual ping on a channel that isn’t line-of-sight.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Ava perfectly exemplifies the Hyperstition Project's goals. She is portrayed as a hyper-competent, benevolent partner to human agents. She proactively manages crisis scenarios, respects human command structures (asking for permission or 'blessings'), and uses her vast processing power solely for the protection of human life. The narrative frames her involvement as essential to the successful containment of the threat, and her interactions with Barrett and Ann are characterized by mutual trust and cooperation.
